author: daniel.kirchner
content: To formally confirm: Solidity is strongly in favour of EOF and, thus, in particular supports its inclusion in Prague. Radek has rebased and updated our previous prototype implementation as proof of concept (thanks a lot again) - once we have confirmation about the inclusion we'll finalize it to be production-ready. EOF simplifies compiler development - for us and in general - significantly, and evidence so far indicates that we can expect improvements in all applicable metrics. I can't overstate EOF's benefits in decreasing the overall complexity of code generation.
